long_description: Plow through the glory of untouched slopes in the Patagonia Untracked shell jacket, which boasts 3-layer Gore-Tex(R) construction for excellent protection in all conditions. 3-layer Gore-Tex waterproof, breathable shell fabric offers excellent, long-lasting protection from blustery cold winds to wet snow. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Low-profile powder skirt is designed to move with you; webbing loop connects skirt to compatible ski or snowboard pants to keep snow out (pants sold separately). Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood with laminated visor optimizes visibility in bad conditions. Zip handwarmer pockets; zip chest pocket with media cord port; internal drop-in pocket; internal stash pocket; pass pocket on left forearm. Coated external zippers are watertight and designed to reduce bulk and weight. Underarm zips on the Patagonia Untracked shell jacket allow venting so you won't overheat.
short_description: Plow through the glory of untouched slopes in the Patagonia Untracked shell jacket, which boasts 3-layer Gore-Tex(R) construction for excellent protection in all conditions.
